DPRK Permanent Representative at UN Appointed 
   Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Sin Son Ho was appointed as the DPRK permanent representative at the United Nations, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.content:
Nombrado Sin Son Ho como representante coreano ante la ONU
   Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ATCC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Sin Son Ho fue designado como representante permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU.
